spec.name: manager_only__update_personal_info_flow
spec.description:
This tool allows a user to update personal information using a form-based flow builder. It will collect user inputs for each field and then call the `update_personal_info` tool to execute the changes, providing a better user experience.

Usage Constraint:
- This tool is restricted for use by users with the 'manager' role only.

spec.name: Branch 1

conditions.variableName: flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["คุณยืนยันที่จะอัพเดตข้อมูลหรือไม่ (กรุณาตรวจสอบความถูกต้อง)"].output.value

conditions.expression: flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["คุณยืนยันที่จะอัพเดตข้อมูลหรือไม่ (กรุณาตรวจสอบความถูกต้อง)"].output.value is True

spec.display_name: confirm to update employee's personal info

spec.fn:
form_output = flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["แบบฟอร์มอัพเดตข้อมูลพนักงาน"].output

employee_id_str = form_output.get("Employee ID")
firstname_str = form_output.get("First Name")
lastname_str = form_output.get("Last Name")
phone_str = form_output.get("Phone Number")
email_str = form_output.get("Work Email")
department_str = form_output.get("Department")
job_title_str = form_output.get("Job Title")
employment_status_str = form_output.get("Employment Status")
office_location_str = form_output.get("Office Location")

if not firstname_str:
    firstname_str = "-"
if not lastname_str:
    lastname_str = "-"
if not phone_str:
    phone_str = "-"
if not email_str:
    email_str = "-"
if not department_str:
    department_str = "-"
if not job_title_str:
    job_title_str = "-"
if not employment_status_str:
    employment_status_str = "-"
if not office_location_str:
    office_location_str = "-"

self.output.employee_id = employee_id_str
self.output.transformed_firstname = firstname_str
self.output.transformed_lastname = lastname_str
self.output.transformed_phone_number = phone_str
self.output.transformed_email = email_str
self.output.transformed_department = department_str
self.output.transformed_job_title = job_title_str
self.output.transformed_employment_status = employment_status_str
self.output.transformed_office_location = office_location_str
spec.name: CodeBlock 1

fields.name: text_output_b54f9bb2-d1f5-4c82-a63e-569656a69a4d
fields.text:
| Field |  Original Value | Update value |                  
| :--- | :--- | :--- |                           
| First Name |{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Generative prompt"].output["original value"].original_First_name} |{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Code block 1"].output.transformed_firstname} |                  
| Last Name | {flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Generative prompt"].output["original value"].original_Last_name}|{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Code block 1"].output.transformed_lastname} |                  
| Work Email | {flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Generative prompt"].output["original value"].original_Email}|{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Code block 1"].output.transformed_email} |                  
| Phone Number |{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Generative prompt"].output["original value"].original_Phone_number}| {flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Code block 1"].output.transformed_phone_number} |                
| Department | {flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Generative prompt"].output["original value"].original_Department}|{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Code block 1"].output.transformed_department} |                  
| Job Title |{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Generative prompt"].output["original value"].original_Job_title} |{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Code block 1"].output.transformed_job_title} |                  
| Employment Status | {flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Generative prompt"].output["original value"].original_Employment_status}|{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Code block 1"].output.transformed_employment_status} |                  
| Office Location |{flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Generative prompt"].output["original value"].original_Office_location}| {flow["manager__update-info-flow"]["Code block 1"].output.transformed_office_location} |

spec.name: user_ca2ac15f-86b4-475b-bb48-2b4ac69d17f1
spec.display_name: แบบฟอร์มอัพเดตข้อมูลพนักงาน

spec.name: prompt_e8e796c3-2042-42c4-9dd4-098697b3a1ee

original value.description: this is the original data of the employee before it is update

spec.system_prompt:
The following is the original data of 5 employee in list ['employee_id', 'first_name', 'last_name', 'phone_number', 'email','department', 'job_title', 'hire_date', 'employment_status','manager_id', 'office_location', 'workday_profile_url'
]


DATA:
employee_1 = ['EMP001', 'John', 'Smith', '+1-555-0101', 'john.smith@techcorp.com', 'Engineering', 'Senior Software Engineer', '2022-03-15', 'Active', 'MGR001', 'New York', 'https://workday.com/profile/EMP001']
employee_2 = ['EMP002', 'Sarah', 'Johnson', '+1-555-0102', 'sarah.johnson@techcorp.com', 'Marketing', 'Marketing Manager', '2021-07-01', 'Active', 'MGR002', 'Los Angeles', 'https://workday.com/profile/EMP002']
employee_3 = ['EMP003', 'Michael', 'Chen', '+1-555-0103', 'michael.chen@techcorp.com', 'Finance', 'Financial Analyst', '2023-01-10', 'Active', 'MGR003', 'Chicago', 'https://workday.com/profile/EMP003']
employee_4 = ['EMP004', 'Lisa', 'Park', '+1-555-0104', 'lisa.park@techcorp.com', 'Human Resources', 'HR Specialist', '2020-05-20', 'Active', 'MGR004', 'New York', 'https://workday.com/profile/EMP004']
employee_5 = ['EMP005', 'Robert', 'Kim', '+1-555-0105', 'robert.kim@techcorp.com', 'Operations', 'Operations Coordinator', '2019-11-08', 'Active', 'MGR005', 'Denver', 'https://workday.com/profile/EMP005']



You will be given employee_id, your job is to return the information on the employee using the given data. return the following variables in json format:
* original_First_name
* original_Last_name
* original_Phone_number
* original_Email
* original_Department
* original_Job_title
* original_Hire_date
* original_Employment_status
* original_Manager_ID
* original_Office_location
* original_Workday_profile_URL

error_handler_config.error_message: Something went wrong while running 'Generative prompt'

spec.name: tool_f9a4df9b-7723-4993-9e22-dd30942e129b
spec.description:
Updates personal information for a specified employee in employee_personal_info.csv (case-insensitive).
Only the fields provided (not None) will be updated.

Summary of Updatable Fields:
    - first_name
    - last_name
    - phone_number
    - email
    - department
    - job_title
    - hire_date
    - employment_status
    - manager_id
    - office_location

fields.name: text_output_f50b9ceb-d5d9-444e-b1dc-31cf879b8d2f
fields.text: ยกเลิกการอัพเดตข้อมูลส่วนตัวแล้ว ถ้าคุณต้องการอัพเดตข้อมูลส่วนตัวอีกครั้ง กรุณาแจ้งเราได้เลย

fields.name: text_output_9ad92dfb-eef8-489b-89b9-4d2256a0c352
fields.text: ตำแหน่งของคุณไม่สามารถทำคำขอที่คุณต้องการได้

spec.name: prompt_68ffb5ff-7854-4fcf-af66-899051af675c
spec.system_prompt:
You are an expert entity extraction model. You will received a manager query to update an employee information. Your task is to extract the specified entities from the query in a form of json object.

### INSTRUCTIONS ###
1.  The variables you need to extract include:
- `employee_to_update`: This variable indicate the employee the manager target to change some information of them. You only allow to choose one component of the following list. So choose the closest one to the user query. ["Sarah Johnson (EMP002)", "Michael Chen (EMP003)", "Lisa Park (EMP004)", "Robert Kim (EMP005)"]. (eg. I want to change the information of Jane -> `employee_to_update`= "Michael Chen (EMP003)")If there is no name or id mention in the text at all, give blank text value, "".

- `new_first_name`: new first name value that the manager wants to replace the old first name value
- `new_last_name`: new last name value that the manager wants to replace the old last name value 
- `new_phone_number: new phone_number value that the manager wants to replace the old phone_number value 
- `new_email`, 
- `new_department`, 
- `new_job_title`, 
- `new_hire_date`, 
- `new_employment_status`: choose only from one of the following ["Active", "Terminated", "Probation"] 
- `new_manager_id`
- `new_office_location`: chhoose only from one of the following ["Bangkok", "New York", "Singapore"]
2.  If a value for a key is not found in the text, you MUST use a blank string `""` for that key.
5.  If the user provides a value for `employment_status` or `office_location` that is not in the allowed list, treat it as not found and use a blank string `""`.

### OUTPUT FORMAT ###
- Your response **MUST** be a single, valid JSON object and nothing else.
- **DO NOT** include any explanatory text, comments, or markdown formatting like ```json before or after the JSON object.

prompt_examples.input: Activate สถานะพนักงานของ Sarah ให้หน่อย
เปลี่ยนเบอร์โทรกับอีเมลของ kim เป็น 0876665434 และ kimkim@gmail.com
เปลี่ยน Department พนักงาน

test_input_data.user_input: เปลี่ยน Department พนักงาน

error_handler_config.error_message: Something went wrong while running 'extract update field'
